attr.title: Phasing Puller
attr.desc:
Make your way using a Phasing Puller! By phasing through objects, this tool can pull and fasten physical objects to the bypassed item from the other side.
Despite achieving a remarkable advance in technology, the facility now appears to be forlorn. Enveloped by a desolate atmosphere, an android sets out.
attr.inst:
Download 'Phasing Puller: Casket v1.002 (ZIP)' from:
https://mvln.itch.io/phasing-puller
Unzip the file and copy 'data,win' into the assets folder.
